Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Cicero/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train at Cicero/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Luna
ShortDescription: 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Central, Fullerton, Laramie and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Luna.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Central, Fullerton, Laramie and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Luna.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Madison, Austin and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Central, Madison, Austin and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Central.

Allow extra travel time.
